entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow dev environments to auto-enable dev-centric features in "slim" host builder #46096
  • HubFilter should act the same way as an API middleware #46095
  • .Net Core Signal R Chat Client UI Options #46093
  • Blazor Custom elements with .net 7 Blazor Server not working properly #46091
  • Perf improvement: stage1publishaot #46090
  • Pseudo loc menu item appearing on project context menu (view in browser) #46089
  • Update "api" project template to use new methods on Random #46087
    8.0-preview2
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web should default to TrimMode=full #46084
  • Access-Control-Allow-Origin not added to response header #46083
  • Perf improvement: caching #46081
  • gRPC requests fail if made via nginx k8s ingress controller #46079
  • `Challenge` vs `ChallengeResult` #46076
  • [AOT] Annotate Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results for trimming and AOT #46075

Closed

  • Add Project Template for an API application with minimal dependencies #45526
    8.0-preview1
  • Improvements to null state analysis on AuthorizationResult #45751
    8.0-preview1
  • .NET 7 Blocker - Method get_ServerSideSessions in type ApiAuthorizationDbContext from assembly IdentityServer does not have an implementation #46025
  • Microsoft.dotnet-openapi issue with whitespace character folder path #45893
  • Process terminated with error: Exception thrown from SocketAsyncEngine event loop #45988
  • PI proposal #46080
  • [AOT] Remove usage of System.Linq.Expressions #46014
  • Exception java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to invoke virtual method 'void #45315

PullRequests

Created

  • string.Split to Span.Split #46098
    Perf
  • Fix Blazor PageContext disposal #46097
    area-blazor
  • Add section to UpdatingMajorVersionAndTFM.md about marking APIs shipped #46088
  • Enumerate paramnames on startup #46086
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [AOT] Enable analysis and annotate Http.Results #46082
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] Don't throw exception for unresolved type #46078
    area-runtime
  • Add DispatchExceptionAsync to ComponentBase #46074
    area-blazor, feature-rendering

Merged

  • Add new "api" project template that supports native AOT #46064
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview1
  • Adding a new rule for automating repro request comments #46094
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Add nullable attribute to AuthorizationResult.Succeeded #46092
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Mark API as shipped #46042
    tell-mode, 7.0.3
  • Mark API from 7 as shipped #46069
    8.0-preview1
  • Set StaticFileOptions.OnPrepareResponse = CacheHeaderSettings.SetCacheHeaders for Blazor static files endpoint #46085
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • Move EmptyHttpResult to Http.Abstractions #46077
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Don't throw exception for unresolved type #46070
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [AOT] Add expression free request filter pipeline for RequestDelegate #46020
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update tests to reflect change of web app manifest extension in React C# template #43765
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Wrong replication of resource names in embedded file provider #46067
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [Blazor WebAssembly] Change web app manifest extension to “webmanifest” #43756
    area-mvc, community-contribution, .NET 8 Planning
  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks
  • Making `JsonOptions` AOT/Trimmer-safe with EnsureJsonTrimmability switch #45886
  • Run test on Linux and Mac #45642
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add IRateLimiterStatisticsFeature with default implementation and tests #46028
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Flags enum provided as list #46049
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/Components/Web.JS #45864
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Enable setting ServerTimeout and KeepAliveInterval in HubConnectionBuilder #46065
    area-signalr
  • Improve Win bundle installers' UI #45935
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers
